## Quaternion.fromAxisAngle() method

Creates a quaternion from the given angle and rotation axis.

**Signature:**

```typescript
static fromAxisAngle(axis: Vector3, angle: number, result?: Quaternion): Quaternion;
```

</th><th>

Description

</td><td>

The rotation axis.


</td></tr>

</td><td>

number


</td><td>

The rotate angle.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

result


</td><td>

[Quaternion](doc/markdown/./base.quaternion.md)


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ The output quaternion, if not specified, a new quaternion will be created.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

[Quaternion](doc/markdown/./base.quaternion.md)

The output quaternion
